languages.text: Обитатели станции Футфол восславят Вольного Торговца, избавивш{mf|его|ую} их от мучительного выбора между смертью от голода и властью Инцендии Чорда.

traits.locale_text: Обитатели станции Футфол восславят Вольного Торговца, избавивш{mf|его|ую} их от мучительного выбора между смертью от голода и властью Инцендии Чорда.

languages.text: The inhabitants of Footfall Station will praise the Rogue Trader who spared them the painful choice between starvation and succumbing to the reign of Incendia Chorda.
languages.original_text: Обитатели станции Футфол восславят Вольного Торговца, избавивш{mf|его|ую} их от мучительного выбора между смертью от голода и властью Инцендии Чорда.

traits.locale_text: The inhabitants of Footfall station will praise the Rogue Trader who spared them the painful choice between starvation and succumbing to the reign of Incendia Chorda.

The inhabitants of Footfall Station will praise the Rogue Trader who spared them the painful choice between starvation and succumbing to the reign of Incendia Chorda.

languages.text: 落脚港的居民一定会赞美行商浪人的善行。如今，他们不必在“饥饿”与“服从因森蒂娅·库尔达的统治”这两者之间做出痛苦的抉择。
languages.original_text: The inhabitants of Footfall Station will praise the Rogue Trader who spared them the painful choice between starvation and succumbing to the reign of Incendia Chorda.

traits.locale_text: 落脚港的居民一定会赞美行商浪人的善行。如今，他们不必在“饥饿”与“服从因森蒂娅·库尔达的统治”这两者之间做出痛苦的抉择。

languages.text: Los habitantes alabarán a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que les ha salvado de tener que elegir entre morir de hambre o someterse al dominio de Incendia Chorda.
languages.original_text: The inhabitants of Footfall Station will praise the Rogue Trader who spared them the painful choice between starvation and succumbing to the reign of Incendia Chorda.

traits.locale_text: Los habitantes alabarán a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que les ha salvado de tener que elegir entre morir de hambre o someterse al dominio de Incendia Chorda.

languages.text: Die Bewohner der Station Footfall werden {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} preisen, {mf|der|die} ihnen die schmerzhafte Wahl zwischen Verhungern und Unterwerfung unter die Herrschaft von Incendia Chorda erspart hat.
languages.original_text: The inhabitants of Footfall Station will praise the Rogue Trader who spared them the painful choice between starvation and succumbing to the reign of Incendia Chorda.

traits.locale_text: The inhabitants of the Footfall station will praise the Rogue Trader who spared them the painful choice between starvation and succumbing to the reign of Incendia Chorda.

languages.text: Les habitants de Castel rendront hommage {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} qui leur a épargné le choix douloureux entre la famine et la soumission au règne d'Incendia Chorda.
languages.original_text: The inhabitants of Footfall Station will praise the Rogue Trader who spared them the painful choice between starvation and succumbing to the reign of Incendia Chorda.

traits.locale_text: Les habitants de Castel rendront hommage {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} qui leur a épargné le choix douloureux entre la famine et la soumission au règne d'Incendia Chorda.

languages.text: フットフォール・ステーションの民は、飢えるか、大人しくインセンディア・チョーダに支配されるか、という苦渋の選択から救ってくれた自由開拓者を称えるだろう。
languages.original_text: The inhabitants of Footfall Station will praise the Rogue Trader who spared them the painful choice between starvation and succumbing to the reign of Incendia Chorda.

traits.locale_text: フットフォール・ステーションの民は、飢えるか、大人しくインセンディア・チョーダに支配されるか、という苦渋の選択から救ってくれた自由開拓者を称えるだろう。

languages.text: Binliman İstasyonu'nda yaşayanlar, onları açlıktan ölme ve İncendia Chorda'nın hükümdarlığına boyun eğme seçenekleri arasında bırakmadığı için Hür Tacir'e minnettar kalacak.
languages.original_text: The inhabitants of Footfall Station will praise the Rogue Trader who spared them the painful choice between starvation and succumbing to the reign of Incendia Chorda.
